divs: Sighting DetailsApproximately at 11:40 pm I awoke from about an hours sleep. I went out on front porch to smoke a cigarette. The sky was pitch black and clear, you can see all stars clearly, not a cloud in the sky. I looked up to look at stars when I noticed what i thought was a falling star but it looked like it was going up and it was the same size as the stars with a fire like color to it. then out of nowhere before I could blink my eye there are these 3 triangle shape things just right above the tree lines kind of like gliding over the sky. They were too small to be a plane they were moving way too slow for a plane. they were flying in a diagonal formation and they didn't even make a single sound. the only thing I heard were crickets.they were in the sky for about one minute then they just disappeared. These objects were orangish white that almost seemed to be see thru. I have never in my life seen anything like it. I called the local police, they advised me to call the airport which I did, no military planes that night. I called the NWS in Jackson, MS..no weather ballons at that time of night. I was also advided to call the air nat'l guard in pearl ms. who refered me to security which I did, they advised no military planes. they also told me my conversation was being recored which was fine with me. I just got the internet today. I don't want folks to thing I'm crazy but I know what I saw and it was nothing i have ever experienced before. While I was watching them I wasn't scared it was almost peacful but the next day I was a nervous wreck.
Summary: 3 distinct triangular shapes with orangish white glow.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kosciusko
This sighting has never been favorited.
